lexUnit.name: responsibility.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the quality of having performed a certain act.

sentence.text: On Thursday , Karzai told election officials in a rambling speech that foreigners , not Afghans , bore responsibility for massive fraud in the August presidential balloting .
The government also bears enormous responsibility for the recent developments in the region , said Shireen Mazari , a defense analyst .

A Taliban spokesman told the Associated Press that the insurgency denied responsibility for the attack .

Taliban officials denied responsibility for the attacks , despite warnings Saturday that they were beginning their spring offensive .
Taliban officials denied responsibility for the latest violence , despite warnings Saturday that they planned to launch attacks .

The Pakistani Taliban , which is made up of Sunni Muslims , claimed responsibility for both attacks .

The Polish woman 's abduction unfolded as Japanese officials were trying to win the release of tourist Shosei Koda , 24. Followers of Jordanian-born militant Abu Musab Zarqawi have claimed responsibility for kidnapping Koda .

The Pakistani Taliban , through its spokesman , Azam Tariq , claimed responsibility for the attack .

An Iraqi Shiite group that calls itself Hezbollah , a name it shares with the Lebanese militant organization , later claimed responsibility for the incident , in which there were no Iraqi casualties .

There was no immediate claim of responsibility from the Taliban movement , which in the past has frequently managed to infiltrate Afghan army and police units with sleeper agents who then turn their guns on Westerners .

In the past , militant groups have been quick to take responsibility for bombings .
